KnowledgeBase.Title: isMoney
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Function.Description: The isMoney function returns true if the specified argument is an Money; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isMoney function returns true if the specified argument {obj} is a Money; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isMoney function is used to determine if a Number is a Money.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is a Money, false is returned otherwise
